root.name: The Godfather: Blackhand Edition
root.description: OverviewThe Godfather: Blackhand Edition is the Wii version of The Godfather: The Game, which was previously published Electronic Arts for the PS2, Xbox, Xbox 360, and PC. The Blackhand Edition differs from the original version of the game due to the inclusion of new missions as well as motion controls.

similar_games.game: Grand Theft Auto: Liberty City Stories
